Exactly....

It's banned in most of the countries....but some people woman do it out of desperation and some are forced.....but some rich males have 2-4 wives which isn't bad...at least they are happily living together

That's what humans are now......they are savages, hypocrites, criminals, derailed.....but all we should do is .....be careful,be strong minded,have strong morality,be good at judging what is wrong and what is not,....if we do this...we prevent many bad things from happening
It would be possible....but we all can't do that ....there will always be one fucced up, derailed monster of a person....who would make it impossible
Absolutely....even we fail...many times we should keep trying
